resources.string: Your archived conversations will appear here
Make QKSMS your default SMS app
QKSMS needs permission to send and view SMS messages
QKSMS needs permission to view your contacts
Unlock amazing new features, and support development
Share some love and rate us on Google Play!

plurals.name: dialog_delete_message
plurals.item: Are you sure you would like to delete this conversation?
Are you sure you would like to delete %d conversations?

resources.string: Recipients and replies will be visible to everyone
This is the start of your conversation. Say something nice!
Selected time must be in the future!
You must unlock QKSMS+ to use scheduled messaging
Failed to send. Tap to try again
Please unlock QKSMS+ to use backup and restore
Are you sure you would like to restore your messages from this backup?
Messages that have already been restored will remain on your device
Currently, only SMS is supported by Backup and Restore. MMS support and scheduled backups will be coming soon!
Automatically send a message, at the exact moment you\'d like
Hey! When was your birthday again?
Happy birthday! Look at what a great friend I am, remembering your birthday
Tap outside of the popup to close it
Confirm that messages were sent successfully
Add a signature to the end of your messages
Remove accents from characters in outgoing SMS messages
When composing a message, only show mobile numbers
If your longer text messages are failing to send, or sending in the wrong order, you can send them as MMS messages instead. Additional charges may apply
Re-sync your messages with the native Android SMS database
Drop incoming messages from blocked senders instead of hiding them
Automatically filter your calls and messages in one convenient place! Community IQ™ allows you to prevent unwanted messages from community known spammers
Automatically filter messages from unsolicited numbers by using the \"Should I Answer\" app
Continue to %s and copy over your existing blocked numbers
Your blocked numbers will appear here
Your blocked messages will appear here

resources.string: You can save a starving developer for just %s
You now have access to all QKSMS+ features
QKSMS+ is free for F-Droid users! If you\'d like to support development, a donation would be highly appreciated.
Unlock beautiful theme colors not available on the Material Design palette
Automatically back up your messages. Never again worry about losing your history if you change phones or your phone gets lost
Schedule messages to automatically be sent at a specific time and date
Wait a few seconds before sending your message
Enable night mode based on the time of day
Block messages that contain keywords or match patterns
Automatically forward messages from certain senders
Automatically respond to incoming messages with a preset response
QKSMS is under active development, and your purchase will include all future QKSMS+ features!
You must unlock QKSMS+ to use this
The message to %s failed to send
This will delete all calls from your history
See and listen to your voicemail, without having to call a number. Data charges may apply.
New voicemail waiting. Can\'t load right now.
To set up voicemail, go to Menu > Settings.
To call voicemail, first turn off Airplane mode.
Cannot make a phone call because the Phone application has been disabled.
No app for that on this device
To better protect you, Phone needs to change how blocking works. Your blocked numbers will now stop both calls and texts and may be shared with other apps.
Calls from this number will be blocked and voicemails will be automatically deleted.
Calls from this number will be blocked, but the caller may still be able to leave you voicemails.
You will no longer receive calls or texts from this number.
No one is on your speed dial yet
You don\'t have any contacts yet
Touch image to see all numbers or touch & hold to reorder
Call blocking has been disabled because you contacted emergency services from this phone within the last 48 hours. It will be automatically reenabled once the 48 hour period expires.
You previously marked some callers to be automatically sent to voicemail via other apps.
Calls from these numbers will be blocked and voicemails will be automatically deleted.
Calls from these numbers will be blocked, but they may still be able to leave you voicemails.
Disabled because an emergency call was made.
To enable speed dial, turn on the Contacts permission.
To see your call log, turn on the Phone permission.
To see your contacts, turn on the Contacts permission.
To access your voicemail, turn on the Phone permission.
To search your contacts, turn on the Contacts permissions.
To place a call, turn on the Phone permission.
Phone app does not have permission to write to system settings.
Contacts need to be "telephone", "address book", "storage space" and "location" access.
